original_text: God says, ‘Remember that I am the Lord your God! I brought you out of Egypt, where you were slaves. Now I will make you live in tents again, as you did before, in the wilderness. God says, ‘Remember that I am the Lord your God! I brought you out of Egypt, where you were slaves. Now I will make you live in tents again, as you did before, in the wilderness. God says, ‘Remember that I am the Lord your God! I brought you out of Egypt, where you were slaves. Now I will make you live in tents again, as you did before, in the wilderness. God says, ‘Remember that I am the Lord your God! I brought you out of Egypt, where you were slaves. Now I will make you live in tents again, as you did before, in the wilderness. God says,
korean_text: 네가 애굽 땅에 있을 때부터 나는 네 하나님 여호와니라 내가 너로 다시 장막에 거주하게 하기를 명절날에 하던 것 같게 하리라

sentences.original_text: Remember that I am the Lord your God!
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너의 하나님 여호와인 것을 기억하라!

sentences.original_text: I brought you out of Egypt
Now I will make you live in tents again
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 내가 너희를 다시 장막에 살게 하리라
